text:
Donald Trump is a spoiled brat. 

He grew up as a very rich kid. And now he thinks he can do anything he wants. 

Most people work hard, they tell the truth, they pay their taxes. Trump does the opposite.

I saw firsthand how this system works when I was fighting for the CFPB. Financial reform is complicated, and bank lobbyists bombarded Congress with complex arguments and obscure terms. It's the ultimate insiders’ play: "Trust us because we understand it and you don’t."

Mr. Trump made a series of disastrous choices this week—decisions that tear at the fabric of what this country is about. This is one of them. We must not turn our backs on refugees fleeing horrific violence and persecution around the world. https://twitter.com/nytimes/status/1177334907300909066 QT @nytimes Breaking News: President Trump slashed the American refugee program by almost half. Only 18,000 people will be accepted during the next 12 months.
https://trib.al/76GwK3d

Release the transcripts.

When we talk about gun violence, we must acknowledge the communities hit hardest.  

Community-based intervention programs work - I’m working on a bill that will give them the funding they need. https://twitter.com/GiffordsCourage/status/1177294395781132288 QT @GiffordsCourage How can we solve everyday gun violence?

✅Understand local violence dynamics
✅Empower communities
✅Dedicate resources to preventing violence

Oakland shows us that this model works👇 #EndGunViolence https://lawcenter.giffords.org/a-case-study-in-hope-lessons-from-oaklands-remarkable-reduction-in-gun-violence/

Indigenous wisdom, principles, & organizing have been proven right on climate over and over.

It reeks of self-service.
It reeks of deceit. 

Trump is lawless. He must be impeached.

NYC taxi drivers were trapped in a predatory lending scheme for taxi medallions.

Drivers, many of them immigrants, were piled on w/ million-dollar loans on incomes of $~20k/year. It’s led to a suicide crisis.

They need to be bailed out & those responsible need to answer for it. https://twitter.com/brianmrosenthal/status/1177652287344463872 QT @brianmrosenthal New: @AOC is joining the push for a government bailout of New York City taxi drivers trapped in exploitative medallion loans. She's the most prominent politician so far to call for a bailout: https://www.nytimes.com/2019/09/27/nyregion/AOC-taxi-medallion-bailout.html

Tragic news of yet another TX law enforcement officer killed in the line of duty. Heidi & I are lifting up in prayer the family of Lt. Over the last 20 years, lobbyist spending has skyrocketed.
